Text: RE Test Here are my comments to the CA The only substantive comment has to do with the procedure to follow in the event of a legal proceeding that requires disclosure The procedure you proposed is a pretty tough standard for us to follow and I would prefer a procedure more along the lines I have proposed Please let me know Thanks Original Message From mailto Sent Tuesday August PM To Subject Re Test Mike Here is a DRAFT version of the CA between Enron and KM Power Co Please comment markup etc and send back so that we can get to a final version Thanks for your time and I look forward to hearing from you soon Ben See attached file Kinder Morgan Pwr Co CA Draft DOC Kinder Morgan Pwr Co CA Draft doc

New CA Cc You just sent out another interest letter to Anthony dated August regarding new facilities With it came another CA Could you please make the same changes to this CA as the ones we made to the CA last week Please call me if that is a problem Thanks
